sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. In a bowl, combine thinly sliced cucumber, thinly sliced red onion, and thinly sliced red chili. 2. In a separate bowl, whisk together rice vinegar, sugar, and salt until sugar is dissolved. 3. Pour the vinegar mixture over the cucumber mixture and toss to coat. 4. Garnish with toasted sesame seeds. 5. Serve immediately.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Cucumber (2, thinly sliced), Red Onion (</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Thai Cucumber Salad</name> <nutrition>Calories: 100, Protein: 2g, Fat: 5g, Carbs: 15g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Thinly slice cucumber, red onion, and red chili.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b091d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afeb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
